data.message: Hi! my account has been hacked and they changed my hame into something offending. I changed my password, logged off any other device, but I can`t change back my name because of the 60 days rule. please help me!

replies.message: Hi Paroasa. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2lwO9d2. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2m9hMnX. -Jon
Hi Jay. Thanks for reaching out. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. We appreciate your patience. For more information, please visit: http://bit.ly/2mpcwsH. -Jon
